title: Top shoulder season travel deals - summer/fall 2015
content:
Now is the time to get a great deal on a last-minute summer escape, early fall travel package or, for early birds, a steal on your winter holiday. 
 
This summer and fall shoulder season -- the travel period between peak seasons -- holds many great deals for couples or family travel, whether you want to cruise, stay near home or escape to the sunny south. 
 
Here are our top 10 shoulder season - summer/fall 2015 travel deals.
